meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Hillary Kwiatek Parth Sheth Jared Hall Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6669.

td.p: Hillary Kwiatek, an employee communication specialist from Bethlehem, Pennsylvania
Parth Sheth, a medical student from Atlanta, Georgia
Jared Hall, a graduate student in global policy studies from Austin, Texas (whose 5-day cash winnings total $161,001)

tr.td: I'LL HAVE AN OLD SPANISH
WHAT ARE YOU SELLING?
WORDPLAY
THAT'S THE STORY
FEMALE NOBEL PEACE PRIZE WINNERS
JAMES BOND THEMES
(Alex: You identify the motion picture.)

the Spanish Armada
